hd:
Hello! I am here to help you set up HolographicDisplays to work with PlaceholderAPI placeholders!

Firstly, please download HolographicExtension (https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/holographicextension.18461/) and ProtocolLib (https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/).

Once you have both of those plugins installed, you will be able to put PlaceholderAPI placeholders on holograms but they will not update correctly. To make them update, you will need to add a speed placeholder on each line with a placholder. Find the different speed placeholders on HolographicExtension's plugin page.
Here is an example hologram line:```{medium}%ajpk_stats_highscore%```This will show the player's highscore and will update it every second.
portals: Portal creation in ajParkour is currently broken. You might have to restart the server for new portals to work.
rewards:
Hello! I am here to help you set up rewards in the parkour!

First, open rewards.yml. You will see two sections: intervals and exceptions.

Intervals will activate at an interval you specify. So if you set the interval to 10, it would activate every 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, etc jumps.

Exceptions are exceptions to intervals that will only activate on the score you specify. If you put the exception to 5, it will only activate once the player reaches 5 and no other time.

For more information, please read the docs on rewards: https://wiki.ajg0702.us/ajparkour/configs/Rewards/
norewards:
Hello!
It's pretty easy to disable rewards in ajParkour.
See how to do it here: https://wiki.ajg0702.us/ajparkour/configs/Rewards#no-rewards
suggest:
Hello! If you have a suggestion, please add it to the plugin's feedbacky page. Before making a post, make sure to check if your idea has already been suggested, and if it has, upvote it so I know more people want it!

  ajParkour: <https://app.feedbacky.net/b/ajParkour>
  ajQueue: <https://app.feedbacky.net/b/ajQueue>
  ajLeaderboards: <https://app.feedbacky.net/b/ajLeaderboards>
  ajTNTRun: <https://app.feedbacky.net/b/ajtntrun>
wiki:
Hello! You can probably find the answer you are looking for on the wiki.

You can find the wiki here: https://wiki.ajg0702.us
ping:
Hello! You dont have to ping aj.
He has all notification on for this server, and pings usually just annoy him. If he doesnt respond, you can just try putting a message and he'll see it.
Also keep in mind that he does have to sleep and work sometimes.
board:
Hello!

It seems like you skipped the most important part of setting up ajLeaderboards.
Please read step 2 here: https://wiki.ajg0702.us/ajleaderboards/setup/setup/#2-add-the-placeholder-to-ajleaderboards
placeholders:
Hello!

It looks like you are using the old placeholders for ajLeaderboards. There has been warnings about them being removed starting <t:1616374140:R>, and they were finally removed <t:1629156480:R>.

You can see the new placeholders here: https://wiki.ajg0702.us/ajleaderboards/setup/placeholders/
aping:
Hello! You dont have to ping Austin.
Pings are annoying, and won't speed up responses.
Also keep in mind that he does have to sleep and work sometimes.
dontupdateperm:
Hello! You might not be appearing on the leaderboard because of the `dontupdate` permission.
This can happen if you are opped, or if you have the `*` permission in your permission plugin.
To fix this, either deop yourself, or negate the `ajleaderboards.dontupdate.*` permission in your permission plugin.
